settings.heading: Ingredients
settings.content:
Alcohol, Propylene Glycol, Myristyl Alcohol, Water, Butylene Glycol, Cetrimonium Chloride, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract, Camellia Japonica Leaf Extract, Propanediol, Artemisia Capillaris Extract, Camellia Japonica Flower Extract, Selaginella Tamariscina Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Inonotus Obliquus (Mushroom) Extract, Glycerin, Salicylic Acid, Elaeis Guineensis (Palm) Oil, Panthenol, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Niacinamide, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Extract, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Chlorella Ferment, Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate, Cetearyl Glucoside, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Nicotinamide Adenine Dinucleotide, Hydroxyacetophenone, Linalool, Limonene


Note: The above ingredients have been declared in descending order of their concentrations.

settings.heading: How to use
settings.content:
HOW


STEP 1

After shampooing, apply a generous amount to strands and work upwards to the scalp.



STEP 2

Massage gently to create that rich, creamy texture.


STEP 3

After massaging hair and scalp, rinse thoroughly with warm water.


GOOD TO KNOW

Start by applying to ends of hair first and work your way up, as the ends of hair are often most damaged.

settings.text:
1. Invigorating, soothing hair and scalp treatment to nourish strands and increase hair density.
  2. Nourish your hair like never before with this unique conditioning system. It starts out water thin and builds up to a cream-like consistency upon interaction with water for a luxurious, nourishing experience.
  3. Our patented Deserticola technology ensures proper hair nourishment, refortification, and an increas in hair density.
  4. Post-treatment hair is shiny and soft for a 'do that's to die for.

Inspired by eastern holistic practices in self-care, RIMAN aims to improve professional and personal lives across the world by inspiring people to embrace the sacred practice of slowing down and honoring oneself; to view self-care as much more than a chore or routine, but rather an ancient ritual with holistic benefits.
